data.name: labelInfo.Text
data.value: Then you click "Update" button, for each document's file in the module a file with the same name will be searched in the folder, choosen below. If there are no such file, a document could be unpublished.

data.name: labelFolder.Help
data.value: Please select a folder to search files in.

data.name: labelUnpublishSkipped.Help
data.value: Check to unpublish skipped documents, for which no corresponding file found in the target folder.

data.name: labelPublishUpdated.Help
data.value: Check to publish all documents, for which corresponding file was found in the target folder.

data.name: labelUpdateDefaultFolder.Help
data.value: Check to update default folder value in the module settings.
